advancements.name: Adventuring Time
advancements.description: Discover every biome
advancements.explanation: Enter all 42 listed overworld biomes

advancements.name: Monsters Hunted
advancements.description: Kill one of every hostile monster
advancements.explanation: Kill one of all 33 hostile monsters listed

advancements.name: Hot Tourist Destinations
advancements.description: Explore all nether biomes
advancements.explanation: Visit all five nether biomes

advancements.name: Two by Two
advancements.description: Breed all the animals!
advancements.explanation: Breed all 19 animals

advancements.name: A Balanced Diet
advancements.description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you
advancements.explanation: Eat one of every food item in the game

advancements.name: A Complete Catalogue
advancements.description: Tame all cat variants!
advancements.explanation: Tame all cat variants

advancements.name: Minecraft
advancements.description: The heart and story of the game
advancements.explanation: Have a crafting table in your inventory

advancements.name: Stone Age
advancements.description: Mine stone with your new pickaxe
advancements.explanation: Have cobblestone or blackstone in your inventory

advancements.name: Getting an Upgrade
advancements.description: Construct a better pickaxe
advancements.explanation: Have a stone pickaxe in your inventory

advancements.name: Isn't It Iron Pick
advancements.description: Upgrade your pickaxe
advancements.explanation: Have an iron pickaxe in your inventory

advancements.name: Acquire Hardware
advancements.description: Smelt an iron ingot
advancements.explanation: Have an iron ingot in your inventory

advancements.name: Diamonds!
advancements.description: Acquire diamonds
advancements.explanation: Have a diamond in your inventory

advancements.name: Hot Stuff
advancements.description: Fill a bucket with lava
advancements.explanation: Have a bucket of lava in your inventory

advancements.name: Ice Bucket Challenge
advancements.description: Obtain a block of obsidian
advancements.explanation: Have a block of obsidian in your inventory

advancements.name: We Need to Go Deeper
advancements.description: Build, light and enter a nether portal
advancements.explanation: Enter the nether dimension

advancements.name: Suit Up
advancements.description: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor
advancements.explanation: Have a piece of iron armor in your inventory

advancements.name: Cover Me With Diamonds
advancements.description: Diamond armor saves lives
advancements.explanation: Have a piece of diamond armor in your inventory

advancements.name: Zombie Doctor
advancements.description: Weaken and then cure a zombie villager
advancements.explanation: Cure a zombie villager by splashing it with a weakness potion and feeding it a golden apple

advancements.name: Not Today, Thank You
advancements.description: Block a projectile using your shield
advancements.explanation: Block a projectie with a shield

advancements.name: Eye Spy
advancements.description: Follow an eye of ender
advancements.explanation: Enter a stronghold

advancements.name: The End?
advancements.description: Enter the end portal
advancements.explanation: Enter the end dimension

advancements.name: Enchanter
advancements.description: Enchant an item at an enchantment table
advancements.explanation: Enchant an item at an enchantment table

advancements.name: Nether
advancements.description: Bring summer clothes
advancements.explanation: Enter the nether dimension

advancements.name: Return to Sender
advancements.description: Destroy a ghast with a fireball
advancements.explanation: Kill a ghast by deflecting a fireball back into it

advancements.name: Country Lode, Take Me Home
advancements.description: Use a compass on a lodestone
advancements.explanation: Use a compass on a lodestone

advancements.name: Not Quite "Nine" Lives
advancements.description: Charge a respawn anchor to the maximum
advancements.explanation: Fully charge a respawn anchor with four pieces of glowstone

advancements.name: Who's Cutting Onions?
advancements.description: Obtain crying obsidian
advancements.explanation: Have a block of crying obsidian in your inventory

advancements.name: War Pigs
advancements.description: Loot a chest in a bastion remnant
advancements.explanation: Open a naturally generated, never-before-opened chest in a bastion

advancements.name: Those Were the Days
advancements.description: Enter a bastion remnant
advancements.explanation: Enter a bastion

advancements.name: A Terrible Fortress
advancements.description: Break your way into a nether fortress
advancements.explanation: Enter a nether fortress

advancements.name: Uneasy Alliance
advancements.description: Rescue a ghast from the nether, bring it safely home to the overworld... and then kill it
advancements.explanation: Kill a ghast while the player is in the overworld

advancements.name: Subspace Bubble
advancements.description: Use the nether to travel 7km in the overworld
advancements.explanation: Enter the nether, travel 875 blocks from your starting position, and then exit the nether to the overworld

advancements.name: Local Brewery
advancements.description: Brew a potion
advancements.explanation: Remove a potion, water bottle or empty glass bottle from a brewing stand

advancements.name: Into Fire
advancements.description: Relieve a blaze of its rod
advancements.explanation: Have a blaze rod in your inventory

advancements.name: Oh Shiny
advancements.description: Distract piglings with gold
advancements.explanation: Distract a piglin with gold while not wearing any gold armor

advancements.name: Hidden in the Depths
advancements.description: Obtain ancient debris
advancements.explanation: Have an ancient debris in your inventory

advancements.name: Cover Me in Debris
advancements.description: Get a full suit of netherite armor
advancements.explanation: Have a full set of netherite armor in your inventory

advancements.name: How Did We Get Here?
advancements.description: Have every effect applied at the same time
advancements.explanation: Have ever effect applied at the same time

advancements.name: A Furious Cocktail
advancements.description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time
advancements.explanation: Have every potion effect applied at the same time

advancements.name: Beaconator
advancements.description: Bring a beacon to full power
advancements.explanation: Build and power a 4-tier pyramid beacon

advancements.name: Bring Home the Beacon
advancements.description: Construct and place a beacon
advancements.explanation: Build and power a beacon

advancements.name: Withering Heights
advancements.description: Summon the wither
advancements.explanation: Summon the wither

advancements.name: Spooky Scary Skeleton
advancements.description: Obtain a wither skeleton's skull
advancements.explanation: Have a wither skeleton skull in your inventory

advancements.name: This Boat Has Legs
advancements.description: Ride a strider with a warped fungus on a stick
advancements.explanation: Use a fungus on a stick to get a speed boost while riding a strider

advancements.name: The End
advancements.description: Or the beginning?
advancements.explanation: Enter the End dimension.

advancements.name: Free the End
advancements.description: Good luck
advancements.explanation: Kill the ender dragon.

advancements.name: The Next Generation
advancements.description: Hold the Dragon Egg
advancements.explanation: Have the dragon egg in your inventory.

advancements.name: Remote Getaway
advancements.description: Escape the island
advancements.explanation: Enter an end gateway and travel to the outer end.

advancements.name: City at the End of the Game
advancements.description: Go on in, what could happen?
advancements.explanation: Enter an end city.

advancements.name: You Need a Mint
advancements.description: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle
advancements.explanation: Have a bottle of dragon's breath in your inventory.

advancements.name: The End... Again...
advancements.description: Respawn the Ender Dragon
advancements.explanation: Respawn the Ender Dragon by placing four end crystals on the end fountain

advancements.name: Sky's the Limit
advancements.description: Find elytra
advancements.explanation: Have an elytra in your inventory

advancements.name: Great View From Here
advancements.description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker
advancements.explanation: Move a total of 50 blocks vertically while you have the levitation status effect

advancements.name: Husbandry
advancements.description: The world is full of friends and food
advancements.explanation: Consume any food item that can be consumed.

advancements.name: A Seedy Place
advancements.description: Plant a seed and watch it grow
advancements.explanation: Plant a seed

advancements.name: The Parrots and the Bats
advancements.description: Breed two animals together
advancements.explanation: Breed two animals together

advancements.name: Best Friends Forever
advancements.description: Tame an animal
advancements.explanation: Tame an animal

advancements.name: Fishy Business
advancements.description: Catch a fish
advancements.explanation: Pull a fish item with a fishing rod.

advancements.name: Tactical Fishing
advancements.description: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!
advancements.explanation: Use a water bucket to catch a fish.

advancements.name: Total Beelocation
advancements.description: Move a bee nest, with 3 bees inside, using silk touch
advancements.explanation: Break a beehive with 3 bees inside using a tool enchanted with silk touch.

advancements.name: Bee Our Guest
advancements.description: Use a campfire to collect honey from a beehive using a bottle without aggravating the bees
advancements.explanation: Use a glass bottle to collect honey from a beehive without angering the bees.

advancements.name: Serious Dedication
advancements.description: Use a netherite ingot to upgrade a hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices
advancements.explanation: Have a netherite hoe in your inventory

advancements.name: Adventure
advancements.description: Adventure, exploration, and combat
advancements.explanation: Kill or be killed by any entity

advancements.name: Monster Hunter
advancements.description: Kill any hostile monster
advancements.explanation: Kill any hostile monster

advancements.name: Ol' Betsy
advancements.description: Shoot a crossbow
advancements.explanation: Shoot a crossbow

advancements.name: Who's the Pillager Now?
advancements.description: Give a pillager a taste of their own medicine
advancements.explanation: Kill a pillager with a crossbow

advancements.name: Sweet Dreams
advancements.description: Sleep in a bed to change your respawn point
advancements.explanation: Lie down in a bed at night

advancements.name: What a Deal!
advancements.description: Successfully trade with a Villager
advancements.explanation: Take an item from a villager or wandering trader's trading output slot, and put it in your inventory

advancements.name: Two Birds, One Arrow
advancements.description: Kill two phantoms with a piercing arrow
advancements.explanation: Use a crossbow enchanted with piercing to kill two phantoms with a single arrow

advancements.name: Arbalistic
advancements.description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot
advancements.explanation: Use a crossbow enchanted with piercing IV to kill five unique mobs with a single arrow

advancements.name: Sticky Situation
advancements.description: Jump into a honey block to break your fall
advancements.explanation: Jump on a the side of a honey block when in air and slide down

advancements.name: Bullseye
advancements.description: Hit the bullseye of a target block from at least 30 meters away
advancements.explanation: Hit the center of a target block with a projectile while 30 blocks away

advancements.name: Take Aim
advancements.description: Shoot something with an arrow
advancements.explanation: Fire an arrow with a bow or crossbow

advancements.name: Sniper Duel
advancements.description: Kill a skeleton from at least 50 meters away
advancements.explanation: Be at least 50 blocks away horizontally when a skeleton (not a stray) is killed by an arrow shot by the player

advancements.name: Voluntary Exile
advancements.description: Kill a raid captain. Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...
advancements.explanation: Kill a pillager wearing an ominous banner and get the bad omen status effect.

advancements.name: Hero of the Village
advancements.description: Successfully defend a village from a raid
advancements.explanation: Kill at least one raid mob while successfully defending a village from a raid

advancements.name: A Throwaway Joke
advancements.description: Throw a trident at something
advancements.explanation: Hit a mob with a thrown trident

advancements.name: Very Very Frightening
advancements.description: Strike a villager with lightning
advancements.explanation: Hit a villager with lightning created by a trident with the channeling enchantment

advancements.name: Hired Help
advancements.description: Summon an iron golem to help defend a village
advancements.explanation: Summon an iron golem

advancements.name: Postmortal
advancements.description: Use a totem of undying to cheat death.
advancements.explanation: Activate a totem of undying by taking fatal damage while the totem is in your hand or offhand
